Package me.aecsocket.calibre.item

Interface CalibreLocalized

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AcceptsCalibrePlugin
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CalibreIdentifiable, CalibreItem, CalibreItemSupplier, CalibreSystem<D>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionSystem, Blueprint, CalibreComponent, FireableSystem, MeleeSystem
    public interface CalibreLocalized
extends AcceptsCalibrePlugin
    A generic Calibre object which has a localizable name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getCalibreType()
      Gets the practical Calibre type of this item, used in getLocalizedName(String).
      String getId()
      Gets the ID of this item, used in getLocalizedName(String).
      default String getLocalizedName​(String locale)
      Gets the localized name of the item, looked up in the plugin's locale manager.
      default String getLocalizedName​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
      Gets the localized name of the item, looked up in the plugin's locale manager.

      • Methods inherited from interface me.aecsocket.calibre.util.AcceptsCalibrePlugin

        getPlugin, setPlugin

    • Method Detail

      • getCalibreType

        String getCalibreType()
        Gets the practical Calibre type of this item, used in getLocalizedName(String).
        Returns:
        The type.

      • getId

        String getId()
        Gets the ID of this item, used in getLocalizedName(String).
        Returns:
        The type.

      • getLocalizedName

        default String getLocalizedName​(String locale)
        Gets the localized name of the item, looked up in the plugin's locale manager.

        This is defined as getCalibreType().getId().

        Parameters:
        locale - The locale to use.
        Returns:
        The localized name.

      • getLocalizedName

        default String getLocalizedName​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Gets the localized name of the item, looked up in the plugin's locale manager.

        This is defined as getCalibreType().getId().

        Parameters:
        sender - The command sender to use the locale for.
        Returns:
        The localized name.
